project.name: ${projectName} Parent

dependencyManagement.dependencies:
#if ( $optionAemVersion != "cloud" ) #if ( $optionSlingModelsLatest == "y" )
org.apache.sling org.apache.sling.models.api ## renovate: depName=org.apache.sling:org.apache.sling.models.api 1.5.4
org.apache.sling org.apache.sling.models.impl ## renovate: depName=org.apache.sling:org.apache.sling.models.impl 1.7.0
#end #if ( $optionContextAwareConfigLatest == "y" )
org.apache.sling org.apache.sling.caconfig.api ## renovate: depName=org.apache.sling:org.apache.sling.caconfig.api 1.3.0
org.apache.sling org.apache.sling.caconfig.spi ## renovate: depName=org.apache.sling:org.apache.sling.caconfig.spi 1.4.0

org.apache.sling org.apache.sling.models.caconfig ## renovate: depName=org.apache.sling:org.apache.sling.models.caconfig 1.0.2
#end #end
#if ( $optionContextAwareConfig == "y" )
io.wcm io.wcm.caconfig.extensions #if ( $optionContextAwareConfigLatest == "y" || $optionAemVersion == "cloud" ) ## renovate: depName=io.wcm:io.wcm.caconfig.extensions 1.9.6 #else
1.8.8 #end
io.wcm io.wcm.caconfig.editor ## renovate: depName=io.wcm:io.wcm.caconfig.editor 1.16.2
io.wcm io.wcm.sling.commons ## renovate: depName=io.wcm:io.wcm.sling.commons 1.6.4
#end #if ( $optionWcmioHandler == "y" )
io.wcm io.wcm.sling.models ## renovate: depName=io.wcm:io.wcm.sling.models 2.0.0-SNAPSHOT
io.wcm io.wcm.wcm.commons ## renovate: depName=io.wcm:io.wcm.wcm.commons 1.11.0
io.wcm io.wcm.wcm.parsys ## renovate: depName=io.wcm:io.wcm.wcm.parsys 1.7.4
io.wcm io.wcm.wcm.ui.granite ## renovate: depName=io.wcm:io.wcm.wcm.ui.granite 1.10.4
io.wcm io.wcm.wcm.ui.clientlibs ## renovate: depName=io.wcm:io.wcm.wcm.ui.clientlibs 1.3.0
io.wcm io.wcm.handler.commons ## renovate: depName=io.wcm:io.wcm.handler.commons 2.0.0
io.wcm io.wcm.handler.url ## renovate: depName=io.wcm:io.wcm.handler.url 2.1.0
io.wcm io.wcm.handler.media ## renovate: depName=io.wcm:io.wcm.handler.media 2.1.1-SNAPSHOT
io.wcm io.wcm.handler.link ## renovate: depName=io.wcm:io.wcm.handler.link 2.2.2
io.wcm io.wcm.handler.richtext ## renovate: depName=io.wcm:io.wcm.handler.richtext 2.0.0
io.wcm io.wcm.wcm.core.components ## renovate: depName=io.wcm:io.wcm.wcm.core.components 2.0.4-2.25.4
#end
io.wcm.devops.conga.definitions io.wcm.devops.conga.definitions.aem ## renovate: depName=io.wcm.devops.conga.definitions:io.wcm.devops.conga.definitions.aem 2.0.4
io.wcm io.wcm.testing.aem-mock.junit5 ## renovate: depName=io.wcm:io.wcm.testing.aem-mock.junit5 5.5.5-SNAPSHOT
#if ( $optionAemVersion == "6.5" && ($optionAemServicePack=="y" || $optionAemServicePackAPI=="y") )
io.wcm io.wcm.testing.logging.logback ## renovate: depName=io.wcm:io.wcm.testing.logging.logback 1.0.0
#else
org.apache.sling org.apache.sling.testing.logging-mock ## renovate: depName=org.apache.sling:org.apache.sling.testing.logging-mock 2.0.0
#end #if ( $optionAemVersion != "cloud" )
com.adobe.cq core.wcm.components.testing.aem-mock-plugin ${core.wcm.components.version}
#end #if ( $optionContextAwareConfig == "y" )
org.apache.sling org.apache.sling.testing.caconfig-mock-plugin ## renovate: depName=org.apache.sling:org.apache.sling.testing.caconfig-mock-plugin 1.5.4
io.wcm io.wcm.testing.wcm-io-mock.caconfig ## renovate: depName=io.wcm:io.wcm.testing.wcm-io-mock.caconfig 1.2.0
#end #if ( $optionWcmioHandler == "y" )
io.wcm io.wcm.testing.wcm-io-mock.sling ## renovate: depName=io.wcm:io.wcm.testing.wcm-io-mock.sling 1.2.0
io.wcm io.wcm.testing.wcm-io-mock.wcm ## renovate: depName=io.wcm:io.wcm.testing.wcm-io-mock.wcm 1.2.0
io.wcm io.wcm.testing.wcm-io-mock.handler ## renovate: depName=io.wcm:io.wcm.testing.wcm-io-mock.handler 2.0.0
#end
#if ( $optionAemVersion == "6.5" )
io.wcm.maven io.wcm.maven.aem-dependencies #if($optionAemServicePack=="y" || $optionAemServicePackAPI=="y")6.5.21.0000#{else}6.5.0.0005#end pom import
#else #if ( $optionWcmioHandler != "y" )
io.wcm.maven io.wcm.maven.aem-cloud-dependencies-mixin-jsonp11 ## renovate: depName=io.wcm.maven:io.wcm.maven.aem-cloud-dependencies-mixin-jsonp11 1.0.0 pom import
#end
io.wcm.maven io.wcm.maven.aem-cloud-dependencies WCMIO_AEM_CLOUD_DEPENDENCIES_LATEST_VERSION pom import
#end
#if ( $optionAemVersion != "cloud" )
com.adobe.cq core.wcm.components.core ${core.wcm.components.version}
com.adobe.cq core.wcm.components.all ${core.wcm.components.version} zip
#end #if( $optionAcsCommons == "y" )
com.adobe.acs acs-aem-commons-bundle ${acs.aem.commons.version}
com.adobe.acs acs-aem-commons-all ${acs.aem.commons.version} zip
#end
org.junit junit-bom ## renovate: depName=org.junit:junit-bom 5.11.0 pom import
org.mockito mockito-core ${mockito.version}
org.mockito mockito-junit-jupiter ${mockito.version}
#if ( $optionIntegrationTests == "y" )
junit junit ## renovate: depName=junit:junit 4.13.2
#if ( $optionAemVersion == "6.5" )
com.adobe.cq cq-testing-clients-65 ## renovate: depName=com.adobe.cq:cq-testing-clients-65 1.1.1
#else
com.adobe.cq aem-cloud-testing-clients ## renovate: depName=com.adobe.cq:aem-cloud-testing-clients 1.2.6
#end
#end
